title: Save Arabella
content:
udged by Kagha, leader of the druids, and is clearly in trouble.

Kagha's snake killed Arabella. Her parents should be informed. We told Arabella's parents what happened. They were devastated.

Save Arabella Walkthrough

Simply talk to Kagha and talk her out of the idea of punishing Arabella. (Nature 19, or Persuasion 16) You will be rewarded with an uncommon amulet if you saved Arabella. Alternatively, you can investigate Kagha, and confront her later. In the enclave, you can find Kagha's Chest
